case.state: Ah, if Keito finds out I'm here, I'll definitely get an earful, but... how could I resist such an interesting experience? Anyway, I'm Eichi, nice to meet you all~

(Eh, well, I won't say anything, I'm sure it'll be fine.)

(Suzukaze-san? Aoba-san? How should I refer to her, if I'm not sure of her age? She seems friendly, I'm leaning towards the former, but I guess I'll err on the side of caution...)

Ah, did I walk into the wrong room, perhaps? Ufufu...
Ooh, will we be bathing after this? I've never really had the chance to do this with others before, how exciting~
Eh, at a bar? That almost feels mean to me, I still have a few months before I turn 20...
Oh, hm, I suppose I accidentally came here in proper attire?

...isn't anyone else shivering a bit...? Ah, well, if anything, this gives me extra motivation to win...
Ah, the heat here is quite... {small}well, I just hope it doesn't make me pass out.

Is this your bedroom, ~human~? It looks quite comfortable.
Ah, are we having a sleepover after the game? I'd love it, I've never had a sleepover with anyone but my childhood friend!

So, well... perhaps blondes do have more fun?

Well, I'm excited for the game, but, first, I would like to request that no pictures of me are shared. I would hate to give anyone legal trouble, so...

Hmm, is this a male-only event, or just a coincidence? Not that I'm bothered by it, of course...
(It's not the best idea for someone in my career to come to a place like this, but, I've done my best to prepare for possible undesirable outcomes, so...)

It's okay to not swap out any cards, right?
I believe my hand is fine as it is.

...swapping cards? Ah, yes, sure, uh... no, I don't think I need to do it, this round.

I'll trade four... no, five.

Give me...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...please.

Um... now what do I... oh, yes, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please...
Hmmm... perhaps I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
May I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please? Thank you in advance.
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ seems like the best decision for now.
Hmmm, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ perhaps? Thank you~
Sorry for the trouble, dealer, but may I swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Thank you!

Fluttering about in a dream, the romantic within me is feeling lost upon awakening... ♫
Holding you tight, I'll never let go again, you've caught the youngest princess' heart! ♫

Ah, this hand might...

Oh, by the way, Miku-san, happy birthday! Ah, but I didn't expect to meet you in person at all, let alone today, so I don't have any gifts in hand...

Ah, does me being here bother you, Nagisa-chan? I can look for another table, if you'd prefer. I don't mind it, I don't want you to be uncomfortable.

Ah, my lungs can get quite annoying if I inhale smoke, so I'd prefer no one do it around me... I find the act sort of... visually appealing, though?

Well, in yen, that's about the allowance I used to get... so, I guess... not much? Maybe I'd buy a new tea set.

Hm, well, I guess my life is very different from most people's... what's an uber, though? I've never heard of it.
Ah, hm... I think it depends on what kind of porn you've been looking at, Nanoko-chan. If you try too hard to use it as reference, it might end up poorly... just trust me on this.

...oh, um. Now I feel a little awkward...

As many times as I can- ah, I'm not supposed to say things like that, but... I don't care much anymore.
Aah, I mean, I'd be a hypocrite if I said I wouldn't do it to someone else, so...{small}fufu, I'm not supposed to say those things in public, but, whatever.
...oh, do girls like that too? I hadn't thought about it much, but, you've given me ideas... {small}fufu, even if that's not very idol-like of me.

Oh, hm... I may be able to think of someone, but I don't think I should talk about... that person.

Hmm, I don't know, it depends on who I would be hypothetically dating. I wouldn't share a partner with just anyone, you know?

Aw, this Gregor of yours seems quite sweet~ he sounds a bit like one of the guys in my friend's idol unit, too. Fufu, it's cute when strong men are like that...

Hmmm~ Idols aren't supposed to date in the first place, but if I happened to be in a relationship, I don't think I'd do it... {small}if we didn't agree on that beforehand, that is.

Eh, duck carrying? Well, one should be around... 3 kilograms, or 7-ish pounds...? I think I could carry maybe two, in a good day.
Oh, you don't have money for the train? I can cover it for you no problem, just tell me how much you need.

Fufu, we'll get to see Dr. Ziegler loosen up a bit? I feel honored~
Hm... you-sized, you said...? Hmmm, does that mean you're interested?
Fufu, it's a bit intimidating, I know... but you know what they say about sizes, right? It's more of a matter of knowing how to use it...
Ooh? I'll call you Sakura-san from now on, then!
Ufufu, yes, I know! That's one of the reasons it's so impressive to see you here, Miku-san. I never thought I'd be able to speak to you in person.

Ah, I know, it's a bit intimidating, but... fufu, I may not be the most experienced, but I know how to be careful and make it work... you know, in case you wanted to try...
(Ahhh, she's looking like a doctor again... the universe is so mean to Eichi-kun, never letting him escape the doctors...)
Hey, Darkness, you keep saying these things, but... you're actually enjoying this, aren't you? You know, it's okay to admit it. There's nothing wrong with being a filthy pervert sometimes.
Hmmm, catchy songs, especially ones that might get you "in the mood"...? I don't personally have any, but... you might've just given me an idea for a new solo...
Ah, Anatoly, I heard you mention something about foraging... I hope it's not a rude question to ask, but... is there any particular reason to why you do it?
Is that so? Well, knowing myself, I might just need it, so I'll rely on you if I suddenly feel like I'll collapse!
Oh, how reliable of you, Mikan-san! It's good to know someone in the table has medical knowledge, means I'll be sure to live to play again~
Hm, what's my least depressing... Oh! There was this one time I was about to get an autograph from an idol I'm a fan of, and I went into cardiac arrest, and...
Bad luck? Oh, well, the classmates who hate me the most literally own deadly weapons, but if anything, I think that's a bit lucky, maybe I'll die interestingly.
Fufu, alright, then, order as many as you want! Ah, maybe I should get myself one, too? I've never had it.
Eh, you won't help me carry my stuff if I need it? How mean of you, Takatoshi-kun. I didn't think you were the type to pick on sick people.
Oh, is that so? I'm glad I'm not alone! Sometimes I want to keep buying things, just to see them falling off the display...
Oh, a robot? Did you need to get a license to pilot it? I don't really care for cars, so maybe I'll get that instead?
Ehhh, is it really that strange of a topic? You must not be a regular here then, Yuno-kun. If you had seen what I've seen, you'd understand.
Ufufu that may be true... but, well, while I may not be able to buy alcohol, I'd still love to treat you to something, Mari, so let me know if there's anything you want~
Is that so? I've never felt something like this... I suppose being hospitalized always makes me wonder if that's when I'll die, but I think that's different...
(Oh, is he not good at reading? Hm, maybe I could help him later... I wouldn't want to embarrass him by pointing it out, though, he's far too cute for that.)
That's true! Ufufu, I'm sure my answer to that won't be so interesting, though... I'm just from Japan, not too far away from Tokyo, and I live in the Ensquare dorms. That's about it .
Hmmm, Kazuma-kun is quite confident today, isn't he? Well, I'll take you up on your offer, then.
Eeh, Kazuma-kun wants to make a bet? That sounds interesting, I'm in!
Ah, really, Blake? You might have to act as my tour guide, since I'm still not used to malls... but I'm sure we could have fun together~!

Eh, really? Well, I suppose I'm too used to the comfort my own lifestyle allows me... fufu, it'd probably still be difficult for me to move around so much if I had to, though, with the way this body is...

Fufu, believe it or not, I feel the same, Blake... it was plenty of work to get where I am in my career, and while I've definitely made a lot of mistakes... I would like to keep performing, you know? For as long as I can,
Oh, Blake, you said you're a huntress? I wonder what it's like to have that sort of occupation... it sounds quite dangerous, and yet you seem so calm talking about it...
Oh, you have a compression glove? I understand the feeling a bit, though in my case, it's compression socks, sometimes... my ankle joints already aren't great, and since I dance a lot....

Ah, n-no, I don't think I have any... it's not weird if I want to... b-be humiliated in front of others or-- have them call me disgusting and-- {small}um, or having them... c-choke me, or threaten me, or...
(Anatolyyyy, why are you so cute?)
Hmmm, Darkness has taken a liking to Nagatoro-chan, hasn't she? Somehow, that's not surprising at all~

Oh, a school trip? I hope you've been having fun! I'm not from here either, but I'm just traveling alone. I'm happy to have gotten a few days off~
Well, that's actually a good way to describe it.. I know it may not be groundbreaking... but what matters to me is that I create something that can make people smile.

Hey, ~human~, if you're so fond of looking at me, you should just go look up "Eichi Tenshouin merchandise"~
Ufufu, such a dangerous game...
Ah, my breathing is quite fast, maybe I should... sit down...

Fufu, sometimes it's difficult to tell if you're trying to lose or not, you know, Darkness?
You know what comes closer and closer each time you're defeated, right, Darkness?
I’ve played plenty of poker before, so if anyone is having trouble, don’t be afraid to rely on me for tips~
This is the most thrilling version of poker, don’t you agree? Ah, if only I could have brought Keito along with me, I think he could use some loosening up…
Let’s keep doing our best, everyone. Even if you're quite underdressed there’s always a chance you could still win… if you want to.
(I wonder if Wataru would ever be willing to join a game like this… he’s so unpredictable, I feel like he’d say yes but disappear in a flock of doves the first time he lost…)
Maybe I shouldn't come back here so often, but it's just too much fun every time...
*cough* Ah, don't worry about me, this just happens.
Fuu, there's no way at all to make the environment a little warmer, is there?
Ah, with how cold it is, I definitely will do my best not to lose...
The heat really is unforgiving here, isn't it... hm, is it against the rules for the players to have a drink of water, or...?
It's really hot, isn't it... is the universe perhaps trying to encourage me to lose?
...make sure to keep the camera away from me, of course!
Hey, um... is anything being filmed, or pictures are being taken?
(I, ah... can't stop wondering if there's even more people watching me play this... since we're in public...)
(Of course, it's strip poker, I knew what I was getting into, b-but doing it in a public place like that...)
(D-Did I just see someone staring at me from the distance? I'm... starting to tremble...)
(It feels... quite hot here, for some reason...)
M-My nipples are just hard because of the cold air, of course...
I'm really cold now... would anyone be willing to... warm me up?
Hmmm, you've lost quite a few hands, haven't you, ~mean~? You need to be more careful, you might be getting distracted.
Is everything okay, ~mean~? Are you feeling a little embarrassed, perhaps?
Fufufu, did I just see you angrily looking at me, ~mean~? You know words won't hurt me, so just say whatever's on your mind~
Fufu, hey, ~serious~... you're giving us quite an eyeful, how does that make you feel?
~serious~, if I stare too much, are you going to scold me? I can see it in your eyes, you want to do that, don't you?
Doing okay over there, ~serious~? Fufu, I just wonder how that exposure feels to you...
Ufufu, I'm rather undressed, but that shouldn't distract you too much, right, ~serious~? Since you're so serious and proper~
Oooh? Did I just catch ~serious~ staring at me? Oh, my, I wouldn't have expected you to be so bold...
Is... ~serious~ really pent up, after all? Hmmm, is that what hides behind such a severe face?
Do they serve tea here, by any chance? They might not have my favorite blends, but I’m open to new experiences. It’s why I came here in the first place.
Is anyone hungry? Feel free to order whatever menu items you'd like, I'll gladly cover the tab if anyone wishes, too!
Well, I'm not 20 just yet, but... actually, that's just the drinking age in Japan, this place is strange, so maybe it's different??
Eh, ~serious~ seems so proper, it's honestly hard to believe
Hey, ~serious~, you know what the rules of this game are, yes? It's hard to believe you'd be willing to strip and even... forfeit, in front of all these people.
I can't help but think, ~serious~, for you to come to a place like this, it must be some sort of drastic measure. I wonder if you're pent up...
Eh, ~mean~ is so mean... we're just here to have fun, aren't we? Hm, maybe you're just embarrassed?
You know, ~mean~, you can keep hurling your insults here and there, but I'm not quite so intimidated for you. I may have a fragile body, but it takes plenty to break my mind...~
You know, ~mean~, I can't help but wonder what you'll do if you lose... would that bravado of yours be gone, or would it stay? I'm excited to find out, I must admit.

Um... please keep my secret safe, will you? If you want compensation for it, well...
I'm definitely not idol-like now, but, ah...
Ah, ~idol~, it's... so bold of you, you know. Showing yourself... like that...
~idol~, you're really being so, so... a-ah, but don't worry, your secret will be safe with me.
Oh, ~idol~, t-thank you... for the wonderful performance. I can only hope I'll... match up to you, one day.
